title: Care Log Entry
stool_condition_help_intro: These are not photos. Choose the closest condition. If you're unsure, selecting "Good" is fine.
stool_condition_desc_1: Low moisture and dry-looking. It may be small and segmented.
stool_condition_desc_2: Well-formed with appropriate softness. This is the typical target.
stool_condition_desc_3: Formed but slightly easy to flatten. Can be a temporary change.
stool_condition_desc_4: Hard to keep its shape. Soft and unformed.
stool_condition_desc_5: Almost liquid. Spreads easily with no shape.
notes_placeholder: Please note if there are any concerns
care_image_note_receive_suffix: accepted. Saved image is compressed to
care_image_note_suffix: or less. After submission, photos are not shown on the public screen.
save_success_offline: Saved offline. It will sync automatically once you are back online.
save_validation_error: Missing or invalid values. Please review the highlighted fields.
copy_no_data: No previous record found (this looks like the first entry).
copy_failure: Unable to find a previous record to copy.
status_offline: âš  Offline (entries will be stored locally)
error_api_failed: Failed to submit. Please try again later.
